item.title: Distribution
item.description:
India Post

Package acceptance mostly works based on consensus, with clerks consulting each other (possibly seniors).

Packaging

Securing

Packaging should be such that it can’t be tampered with in transit. (Not really required, but package is oft not accepted otherwise.)

Simply typing books pack with thread suffices as per sahakAra-nagar post office clerk.

Packaging with amazon etc. branding and bar codes is a cause for non-acceptance.

Gyan Post

Source: TW

It had a different name before.
2026 Rs. 20/kg. Max 5 kg/book parcel.

item.title: e-book Prep
item.description:
Making

Make epub book

  • Using Calibre ( on Ubuntu etc..)
    • Create an “empty book”.
    • Create a html with contents (Google Play is fussy about tags. Content should be within

      tag. Use a template.

    • Add that content html with Add Books→ Add files to selected book records. Create cover using gimp. Edit metadata and save.
      • Example project here.
  • Can use typst.

Make Kindle ebook: Techniques

  • Create epub book. Convert to mobi.
  • Follow instructions in tutorial 201508.
  • Kindle-store-मध्ये भारतीयभाषाणां पुस्तकानि प्रायो नवीनतर-.azw3-format-द्वारा रचितानि विद्यन्ते। .mobi-format-द्वारा रचितानां देवनागरीपुस्तकानामुद्घाटनं पृष्ठपरिवर्तनं च महत्कष्टम्। तस्माद् Windows-मध्ये Calibre-द्वारा KFX Output plugin उपयुज्य .azw3-format-संस्कृतानि पुस्तकानि कुर्यात्। (2018)

Extracting from Google Play

  • Using Adobe Digital Editions + Calibre with DeDRM plugin
    • mac osx guide here.

Linux

  • Adobe digital editions on Wine
    • Adobe digital editions 4.5 works for some time but crashes as of 202205.
    • Adobe digital editions 1.7 on Wine fails as of 202205.
  • Adobe digital editions (ADE) key
    • Android location here.
    • Could not figure out location under Wine.
